channel.title: Computer Keyboard layout
channel.description:
Hi everyone, I'm KlyntarX *I'm not really into telling my real name* I'm 13 years old and I really like learning *You can say I'm a huge nerd* I came to Sweden for studies and I got myself a new keyboard. Back in my country, I had a 135 wpm where the keyboard layout was the regular QWERTY keyboard layout. This question is not related to hacking or penetration testing or anything I just want to ask How can I improve my typing speed if I have to change the layout? Can you guys tell me the most effective way to improve my typing speed to the same level as before? I know there is like 1 million YouTube videos that cover this topic but I don't really think that's the most effective way to keep a consistent typing speed.
by KlyntarX

item.title: Computer Keyboard layout
item.dc:creator: system
item.description:
This topic was automatically closed after 121 days. New replies are no longer allowed.

Read full topic
